JOB DESCRIPTION: JOB ROLE     We are working on building a big, disruptive, high-end, pan-India eCommerce website    Candidates will be expected to work in one or more areas of    Website Development (PHP, MySQL)    HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Bootstrap    API based Integrations    Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) and Microservices    Android iOS Hybrid Mobile App Development    Big Data, Hadoop    Containerization using Docker, Kubernetes, etc.    We are seeking highly motivated individuals, with excellent technical skills, and can work under pressure.    Training mode will include Theory, Class Discussions, Hands-on, and exposure to Live Projects.    We also have projects on     PHP based solutions    WordPress based solutions    Open Source based solutions    Database Solutions (RDBMS SQL NoSQL)    Mobile App Development (iOS, Android, Windows, Ionic, Cordova, Native, Hybrid)    API REST SOAP based solutions Integrations    JS packages (Node, React, Angular, Vue.js, etc.)    Oracle products based solutions    Rules Automation Policy Formulation solutions    Infrastructure Installation, Configuration & Maintenance    Search Engine Optimization (SEO SMO)    It s a startup. You can expect the worst and the best of jobs under the sun that you will be working on. It s not just one, but maybe 10 different roles that you would be expected to work on.
